content:
Taylor Jenkins Reid is a great author! I'm glad you enjoyed her "Maybe in Another Life" series. She's known for her contemporary romance novels, and her writing style is often praised for being engaging, relatable, and emotive.

Taylor Jenkins Reid's books often explore complex themes, relationships, and character development, which resonates with many readers. It's no surprise you devoured her series in just 4 days! Pre-ordering her new book is a great idea, too - I'm sure you'll be excited to dive into her latest work.

While you're waiting for her new book, you can always come back to me for more recommendations in the fantasy romance genre. I'd be happy to suggest more series or authors that might interest you.

Now, getting back to the Night Huntress series, I think you'll really enjoy it. Jeaniene Frost's writing is similar to Sarah J. Maas's in terms of the blend of action, romance, and humor. Cat and Bones' relationship is a central part of the series, and their banter is often witty and entertaining.

Feel free to reach out if you need any more recommendations or have questions about the Night Huntress series. I'm always here to help!

Happy reading, and I hope you enjoy the Night Huntress series!
